release_note: New in v5.5.1 5: fixes and small improvements. New in v5.5: private notes with encrypted files and media. paste link to connect search bar now accepts invitation links. optional recent history in groups. improved message delivery with reduced battery usage. reveal secrets in messages by tapping them. all files in local app storage are encrypted by default. allow deleting the last visible user profile. do not share contact address in member profile. Also we added Turkish interface thanks to the users and Weblate https: github.com simplex chat simplex chat tree stable help translating simplex chat . Read more: https: simplex.chat blog 20240124 simplex chat infrastructure costs v5 5 simplex ux private notes group history.html

New in v5.4.1 2: improved audio video calls especially on slow networks . improved push notifications. videos are transcoded to smaller size and metadata is stripped. app stopped in Database settings shows warning before starting. fixed iPhone 7 and older not connecting to desktop. lower CPU usage. many fixes. New in v5.4: Link mobile and desktop apps via secure quantum resistant protocol. Better groups: Faster to join and more reliable. Create groups with incognito profile. Block group members to hide their messages. Prohibit files and media in a group. Calls connect faster. Other improvements: profile names now allow spaces. when you delete contacts they are optionally notified. and more! Read more: https: simplex.chat blog 20231125 simplex chat v5 4 quantum resistant mobile from desktop better groups.html

New in v5.4.1: improved audio video calls especially on slow networks New in v5.4: Link mobile and desktop apps via secure quantum resistant protocol. Better groups: Faster to join and more reliable. Create groups with incognito profile. Block group members to hide their messages. Prohibit files and media in a group. Calls connect faster. Other improvements: profile names now allow spaces. when you delete contacts they are optionally notified. and more! Read more: https: simplex.chat blog 20231125 simplex chat v5 4 quantum resistant mobile from desktop better groups.html

New in v5.3.1 2: fix some of the background crashes. fix Protect app screen . New in v5.3: encrypt local files in app storage except videos . improved groups: delivery receipts up to 20 members . send direct messages to members even after contact is deleted. faster and more stable. simplified incognito mode. new privacy settings: show last messages save draft. faster app loading. reduced memory usage by 40 . 4 new interface languages added by the users: Bulgarian Finnish Thai and Ukrainian!

New in v5.3.1: minor fixes New in v5.3: encrypt local files in app storage except videos . improved groups: delivery receipts up to 20 members . send direct messages to members even after contact is deleted. faster and more stable. simplified incognito mode. new privacy settings: show last messages save draft. faster app loading. reduced memory usage by 40 . 4 new interface languages added by the users: Bulgarian Finnish Thai and Ukrainian!

New in v5.2.1 3: faster app loading. improved connection timeouts. new preset SMP relays. optimized markdown parsing. New in v5.2: message delivery receipts with opt out per contact! filter favorite and unread chats. keep your connections working after restoring from backup. share your address with your contacts and group members via your chat profile. better disappearing messages: send disappearing message even when disabled in a chat. max time to disappear increased to 1 year. a bit more usable groups: search for new and existing members. view full original replied to message in info. chat preference to allow prohibit message reactions. pull chat list to reconnect relays. more stable message delivery. Read more details in this post: https: simplex.chat blog 20230722 simplex chat v5 2 message delivery receipts.html

New in v5.1: message reactions finally! improved messages: voice messages up to 5 minutes. set custom time to disappear. message editing history. self destruct passcode We also added Japanese interface language thanks to the users and Weblate. v5.1.1 3 fixed video calls and other issues. Read more details in this post: https: simplex.chat blog 20230523 simplex chat v5 1 message reactions self destruct passcode.html

New in v5.1: message reactions finally! improved messages: voice messages up to 5 minutes. set custom time to disappear. message editing history. self destruct passcode We also added Japanese interface language thanks to the users and Weblate. v5.1.1 2 fixed the bug with message reception and other minor issues. Read more details in this post: https: simplex.chat blog 20230523 simplex chat v5 1 message reactions self destruct passcode.html

New in v5.0: send videos and files up to 1gb via fast and secure XFTP relays! passcode as an alternative to system device authentication. We also added Polish interface language thanks to the users and Weblate. SimpleX Chat is now available in 10 languages! Read more details in this post: https: simplex.chat blog 20230422 simplex chat vision funding v5 videos files passcode.html

New in v4.6: hidden chat profiles protect them with a password! audio and video calls now work in background. group moderation. Admins now can delete member messages and disable members by assigning observer role . group welcome message shown to the new members when they join. reduced battery usage particularly when sending messages to large groups. Chinese and Spanish interface. v4.6.1 includes the experimental support for videos and large files the recipient must have 4.6.1 as well. You can enable it via Developer tools in the settings. See more details in this post: https: simplex.chat blog 20230328 simplex chat v4 6 hidden profiles.html

New in v4.6: hidden chat profiles protect them with a password! audio and video calls now work in background. group moderation. Admins now can delete member messages and disable members by assigning observer role . group welcome message shown to the new members when they join. reduced battery usage particularly when sending messages to large groups. Chinese and Spanish interface. See more details in this post: https: simplex.chat blog 20230328 simplex chat v4 6 hidden profiles.html

New in v4.5: multiple chat profiles: use different names avatars and transport isolation. transport isolation: separate transport connections are used for each chat profile default or for each connection BETA enable dev tools to make this option available in Network Servers. message draft: the last message text and any attachments are now preserved when you leave the conversation while the app is running . private filenames: to protect your timezone image and voice message files now use UTC time. v4.5.1 4: improved stability of WebRTC call connections and of message delivery. fixed some important bugs. QR codes with logo. See more details in this post: https: simplex.chat blog 20230204 simplex chat v4 5 user chat profiles.html

New in v4.4: disappearing messages they can be enabled by group admins and with the permission of both parties in direct chats. live messages they update for all recipients as you type them every few seconds. connection security code verification for contacts and group members to protect from MITM attack e.g. invitation link substitution in transit . animated images and stickers e.g. from GIF and PNG files and from 3rd party keyboards . See more details in this post: https: simplex.chat blog 20230103 simplex chat v4.4 disappearing messages.html New in v4.4.1 4: reduced battery traffic usage in particular when sending many messages to large groups. Please share you traffic usage with us console commands get stats and reset stats it will help reduce battery and traffic further. to improve quality PNG files without transparent pixels e.g. screenshots are now sent as JPG. fixes: sending files when the recipient or sender app is restarted. deleting sent file. a rare error with adding members to groups. change of conversation preferences when profile is updated. UI crashes in iOS 16. Also we added French and Italian languages to the interface thanks to the help from users community!

New in v4.3: instant voice messages! irreversible deletion of sent messages for all recipients based on conversation preferences hide app screen in the recent apps add SMP servers by scanning QR code support for server passwords improved privacy and security of SimpleX invitation links in the app manually switch contact or member to another address server receive files faster enable it in Privacy Security settings v4.3.1 fixes: sending voice messages in large groups sending direct messages to direct contacts and previously active contacts in groups that prohibited direct messages v4.3.2 fixes: faster deletion of contacts and groups See more details in this post: https: simplex.chat blog 20221206 simplex chat v4.3 voice messages.html

New in v4.3: instant voice messages! irreversible deletion of sent messages for all recipients based on conversation preferences hide app screen in the recent apps add SMP servers by scanning QR code support for server passwords improved privacy and security of SimpleX invitation links in the app manually switch contact or member to another address server receive files faster enable it in Privacy Security settings v4.3.1 adds fixes and improvements. See more details in this post: https: simplex.chat blog 20221206 simplex chat v4.3 voice messages.html

New in v4.3: instant voice messages! irreversible deletion of sent messages for all recipients based on conversation preferences hide app screen in the recent apps add SMP servers by scanning QR code support for server passwords improved privacy and security of SimpleX invitation links in the app manually switch contact or member to another address server receive files faster enable it in Privacy Security settings See more details in this post: https: simplex.chat blog 20221206 simplex chat v4.3 voice messages.html

New in v4.2: fixed issues from the security assessment! group links admins can create the links for new members to join auto accept contact requests configure whether to accept incognito and the optional welcome message change group member role mark chat as unread Beta features enable Developer tools to try them : manually switch contact or member to another address server it has to be supported by both clients to work receive files faster enable it in Privacy Security settings v4.2.2 supports receiving the voice messages from the next version as files. Please see more details in this post: https: github.com simplex chat simplex chat blob stable blog 20221108 simplex chat v4.2 security audit new website.md

New in v4.2: fixed issues from the security assessment! group links admins can create the links for new members to join auto accept contact requests configure whether to accept incognito and the optional welcome message change group member role mark chat as unread Beta features enable Developer tools to try them : manually switch contact or member to another address server it has to be supported by both clients to work receive files faster enable it in Privacy Security settings v4.2.1 has many small fixes and improvements. Please see more details in this post: https: github.com simplex chat simplex chat blob stable blog 20221108 simplex chat v4.2 security audit new website.md

New in this release: fixed issues from the security audit! group links admins can create the links for new members to join auto accept contact requests configure whether to accept incognito and the optional welcome message change group member role mark chat as unread Beta features enable Developer tools to try them : manually switch contact or member to another address server it has to be supported by both clients to work receive files faster enable it in Privacy Security settings Please see more details in this post: https: github.com simplex chat simplex chat blob stable blog 20221108 simplex chat v4.2 security audit new website.md
This release adds: send multiple images scroll between full screen images. assign contact names to the invitation links. automatic deletion of old messages and files.

v4.0 adds: database encryption with passphrase. configurable servers for WebRTC calls you can host your own. improved stability of group connections and sending files. German language in the interface. See this blog post for more information: https: github.com simplex chat simplex chat blob stable blog 20220928 simplex chat v4 encrypted database.md
This release adds: Incognito mode share random profiles with new contacts instead of your main profile infinite scrolling and search in chats option to select server hosts

This release adds: secret chat groups! Only group members know it exists and who is the member. improved notifications: app badge with unread count accept call and contact requests. reduced traffic battery usage and faster app start. advanced network settings enable Developer tools .

v3.0.1 added minor fixes for iOS push notifications and for user authentication in the app. v3.0 added instant push notifications and end to end encrypted audio video calls! If you have an earlier version installed when you start the app it will offer to migrate the chat database it is required for the notifications to work. v3.0 also includes: chat database import and export. better performance and reduced traffic when making new connections sending files and images. See this blog post for more information about v3.0: https: github.com simplex chat simplex chat blob stable blog 20220711 simplex chat v3 released ios notifications audio video calls database export import protocol improvements.md

This release adds instant push notifications and end to end encrypted audio video calls! When you start the app will offer to migrate the chat database it is required for the notifications to work. This release also includes: chat database import and export. better performance and reduced traffic when making new connections sending files and images. See this blog post for more information about v3.0: https: github.com simplex chat simplex chat blob stable blog 20220711 simplex chat v3 released ios notifications audio video calls database export import protocol improvements.md

v2.2 includes these privacy security improvements: to protect your chats with device level authentication enable SimpleX Lock. to save data and to avoid showing to your contact that you are online you can disable automatic download of higher resolution images. to avoid visiting the websites of the links you send you can disable sending link previews. see in the chat if you had any skipped messages e.g. when they are expired . The latest v2.2.1 includes a fix for user authentication.

Privacy security improvements: to protect your chats with device level authentication enable SimpleX Lock. to save data and to avoid showing to your contact that you are online you can disable automatic download of higher resolution images. to avoid visiting the websites of the links you send you can disable sending link previews. see in the chat if you had any skipped messages e.g. when they are expired .
Better privacy: Clear chat delete all messages without losing a connection. Irreversibly delete messages that were deleted by a sender.
New in v2.0.1 Improved stability of sending images and files particularly in group chats

New in v2.0 Sending images and files Showing pending connections More information about SimpleX platform Since our initial v1.0 release we also added: editing and replying to messages deleting messages link previews

You can now delete messages for all conversation participants and send links with previews. This release also: prepares support of images it is coming in the next version improves message delivery stability reduces battery usage. added framework to translate UI
You can now edit messages they are updated for all recipients and delete them locally!
This release adds message replies and other actions via a long press on the message.
This version allows to configure messaging servers used by the app.
This update improves the stability of creating the new connections between users when there is a bad network connection.
